verses.text: \w Take|strong="H8104"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hands \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* cruel ones, \w O|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w*; \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* safe \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w those|strong="H0853"\w* \w who|strong="H8104"\w* come \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w against|strong="H8104"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H7682"\w* \w out|strong="H6965"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* power \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* workers \w of|strong="H0430"\w* evil, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* keep \w me|strong="H7682"\w* \w safe|strong="H7682"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* men \w of|strong="H0430"\w* blood.

\w For|strong="H0376"\w* see, \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* watching \w in|strong="H0376"\w* secret \w for|strong="H0376"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* soul; \w the|strong="H5337"\w* strong \w have|strong="H0376"\w* come together \w against|strong="H0376"\w* \w me|strong="H3467"\w*? \w but|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3467"\w* because \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* \w sin|strong="H0205"\w*, \w or|strong="H0376"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* evil-doing, O Lord.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* mine \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H2009"\w* quickly \w and|strong="H3068"\w* get \w themselves|strong="H5315"\w* ready; \w be|strong="H3808"\w* awake \w and|strong="H3068"\w* come \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* help, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H2009"\w*.

\w You|strong="H7200"\w*, O Lord God \w of|strong="H5771"\w* armies, \w are|strong="H5771"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* God \w of|strong="H5771"\w* Israel; come now \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w give|strong="H7200"\w* \w punishment|strong="H5771"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* nations; \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w no|strong="H1097"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H7200"\w* any workers \w of|strong="H5771"\w* deceit. (Selah.)

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H6635"\w* back \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* evening; \w they|strong="H3068"\w* make \w a|strong="H3068"\w* noise \w like|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dog, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* go round \w the|strong="H3605"\w* town.

See, hate \w is|strong="H3611"\w* dropping \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* lips; curses \w are|strong="H3611"\w* \w on|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* tongues: \w they|strong="H3611"\w* say, Who \w gives|strong="H7725"\w* attention \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w*?

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4310"\w* laughing at \w them|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H4310"\w* Lord; \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w make|strong="H8085"\w* sport \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w all|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations.

\w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* strength, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* put \w my|strong="H3605"\w* hope \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*; \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* strong tower.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* mercy \w will|strong="H0430"\w* go \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* let \w me|strong="H0413"\w* see \w my|strong="H8104"\w* desire effected \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* haters.

Put \w them|strong="H7200"\w* not \w to|strong="H0430"\w* death, \w for|strong="H0430"\w* \w so|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w people|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w keep|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* memory \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*: let \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* sent \w in|strong="H0430"\w* all directions \w by|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* power; \w make|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* low, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w Lord|strong="H2617"\w* \w our|strong="H7200"\w* saviour.

\w Because|strong="H6435"\w* \w of|strong="H2428"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* sin \w of|strong="H2428"\w* \w their|strong="H2026"\w* mouths \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* word \w of|strong="H2428"\w* \w their|strong="H2026"\w* lips, \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w them|strong="H3381"\w* \w even|strong="H0408"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w taken|strong="H3381"\w* \w in|strong="H2428"\w* \w their|strong="H2026"\w* pride; \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w for|strong="H2428"\w* \w their|strong="H2026"\w* curses \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w their|strong="H2026"\w* deceit,

\w Put|strong="H6310"\w* an \w end|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w them|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w your|strong="H1697"\w* wrath, \w put|strong="H6310"\w* an \w end|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w them|strong="H1697"\w*, \w so|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H6310"\w* \w may|strong="H6310"\w* not \w be|strong="H1697"\w* seen again; let \w them|strong="H1697"\w* see \w that|strong="H1697"\w* God \w is|strong="H1697"\w* ruling \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H5608"\w* \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* ends \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* earth. (Selah.)

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* evening let \w them|strong="H3615"\w* \w come|strong="H3615"\w* \w back|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* noise \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* dog, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* go round \w the|strong="H3588"\w* town.

Let \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w* wandering up \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w down|strong="H5437"\w* \w in|strong="H7725"\w* search \w of|strong="H7725"\w* food, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w there|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H5437"\w* \w night|strong="H6153"\w* if \w they|strong="H3611"\w* \w have|strong="H3611"\w* not enough.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* make songs \w of|strong="H0398"\w* \w your|strong="H0398"\w* power; yes, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H0398"\w* cries \w of|strong="H0398"\w* joy \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w your|strong="H0398"\w* mercy \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* morning; because \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H7646"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H0398"\w* strength \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w my|strong="H0398"\w* high tower \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* day \w of|strong="H0398"\w* \w my|strong="H0398"\w* trouble.

\w To|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H0589"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w song|strong="H7891"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* God \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* high tower, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* God \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* mercy.
